Record Class ControllerTerminal

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
fr.uge.cascadia.controller.ControllerTerminal
Record Components:
gameManager - The manager of the logic of the game.
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameInterface
public record ControllerTerminal(GameManager gameManager) extends Record implements GameInterface
A record representing the terminal controller for the game. It handles interactions between the game logic using the terminal .

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a terminal Controller

    • askToUseNatureToken

      public String askToUseNatureToken()
      Asks the player whether they want to use a Nature Token and specifies the available options.
      Specified by:
      askToUseNatureToken in interface GameInterface
      Returns:
      A string representing the player's choice: - "T" if the player chooses to select a unique tile and a unique token. - "J" if the player chooses to replace the tokens. - "" if the player choose not to use is.
